release.note: Fixed detailed record next previous links. Clicking from a EDS detailed record to Koha record lead to a 404 response
Added a default value to the getParams sub as it was throwing an error if no results were returned
Auto Info update always failed as it was using an old authtoken. Getting a new token if info throws an error.
added {OR RECORD.FullText.CustomLinks} in the custom links section of results.tt as it was not displaying a custom link

Updated plugin to be self containing. No need to copy files into the core directories any more. Used is_plugin parameter to manage template paths and .htaccess to run .pl files. Steps: Install plugin and run chmod 755 eds-* in the opac folder.
Added results per page, view mode, search mode to form resort
Added Setup tool in Plugin Admin with basic instructions on how to deploy the plugin
Made API guest access configurable. User logs into to EDS after they login to Koha automatically.
Added update Info feature in Plugin configuration to get info manually
Added feature to update EDS Info once a day.
Select options are configurable from the plugin panel
Added Default (without EDS) option to config settings
